content.en: Fruit detection revolution: Scientists have been exploring how machine vision and deep learning algorithms can improve the detection and localization of various fruits in different environments. For example, researchers have proposed improved versions of algorithms like Mask-RCNN, Faster R-CNN, YOLOv3, and YOLOv4 to enhance fruit detection performance. These algorithms have shown promise in accurately detecting fruits such as strawberries, cherry tomatoes, apples, litchi, citrus fruits, pecans, green fruits, pineapple, and Xiaomila green pepper, among others. The use of these algorithms can greatly benefit tasks like fruit harvesting, yield estimation, and orchard management.
content.da: Revoluttion inden for frugtdetektion: Forskere har udforsket, hvordan maskinsyn og dyb læringsalgoritmer kan forbedre detektionen og lokaliseringen af forskellige frugter i forskellige miljøer. For eksempel har forskere foreslået forbedrede versioner af algoritmer som Mask-RCNN, Faster R-CNN, YOLOv3 og YOLOv4 for at forbedre præstationen inden for frugtdetektion. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i præcist at detektere frugter såsom jordbær, cherrytomater, æbler, litchi, citrusfrugter, pecannødder, grønne frugter, ananas og Xiaomila grøn peber, blandt andre. Brugen af disse algoritmer kan være til stor gavn for opgaver som frugthøstning, udbytteestimering og frugtplantageforvaltning.
